    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    Facet Email_Summary

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Email_Summary

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Email defaultInd="true" remark="Example String Value" textFormat="Example String Value" validInd="true" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4">
    <Address>Example String Value</Address>
    <Type>Business</Type>
    <Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No"/>
</Email>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Email" : {
    "remark" : "Example String Value",
    "textFormat" : "Example String Value",
    "validInd" : true,
    "defaultInd" : true,
    "Address" : "Example String Value",
    "Type" : {
      "value" : "Business"
    },
    "Privacy" : {
      "value" : null,
      "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
      "shareSyncInd" : "No",
      "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
      "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
      "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
    }
  }
}

      • Property Summary

        Properties 
        Name Description
        Address
        The email address. IETF RFC 2821
        Details
        Type String
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required true
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Type
        Defines the purpose of the e-mail address (e.g. personal, business, listserve). Refer to OpenTravel Code List Email Address Type (EAT).
        Details
        Type EmailAddressType_Enum
        Example Value Business
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        Privacy
        Allows for control of the sharing of access data between parties.
        Details
        Type Privacy
        Example Value ???
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        remark
        A remark associated with the e-mail address.
        Details
        Type StringText
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        textFormat
        Example: text/plain
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value Example String Value
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        validInd
        If true, this is a valid email address that has been system verified via a successful email transmission.
        defaultInd
        If true, this identifies this is the default email address.
